import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card', templateUrl: './card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card.component.css'], }) export class CardComponent { amount = 300; currency = 'HUF'; title = 'Borok'; payerName = 'Bede'; }
{{ title }}

You owe {{ amount }} {{ currency }} to {{ payerName }}
